message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair start!
You can have a small share, but I'm the one who's really hungry!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob! I'll give you a bigger share this time.
You're getting desperate, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but you'll still get a nice chunk!
I'm not giving up yet! Let's meet in the middle again, but this time with a slightly better deal for me.
You're getting closer, but still not close enough. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but don't expect any more generosity from me!
I'm not backing down! Let's split it 50/50, and call it a day.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not feeling generous. You'll have to do better than that if you want to get a bigger share!
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to give up my whole share! I want to get a decent chunk too.
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking control now. This is my best offer, take it or leave it!
